      • editCustomer

        public static boolean editCustomer​(java.lang.Integer customerID,
                                   java.lang.String customerName,
                                   java.lang.String customerAddress,
                                   java.lang.String customerPostal,
                                   java.lang.String customerPhone,
                                   java.sql.Timestamp createDate,
                                   java.lang.String createdBy,
                                   java.sql.Timestamp lastUpdate,
                                   java.lang.String lastUpdatedBy,
                                   java.lang.Integer divisionID)
                            throws java.sql.SQLException
        Updating Customers based on selection in the customer dashboard
        Parameters:
        customerID - the customers id
        customerName - the name of the edited customer
        customerAddress - the address of the edited customer
        customerPostal - the postal code of the edited customer
        customerPhone - the phone number of the edited customer
        createDate - the date the customer was created
        createdBy - the user that created the customer
        divisionID - the division of the location of the customer
        lastUpdate - the last time the customer was updated
        lastUpdatedBy - the last user to update the customer
        Returns:
        retruns either true or false depending on the success of the execution
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - Throws a exception if the database isnt updated
